intro: Heptapleurum fengii, commonly known as the Chinese evergreen, is a species of flowering plant in the family Pentaphylacaceae. It is native to China and is characterized by its upright growth habit and glossy, dark green leaves. The plant produces small, inconspicuous white flowers that are followed by red berries. It thrives in shaded to semi-shaded environments and prefers moist, well-drained soil. Heptapleurum fengii is often cultivated as an ornamental plant for its attractive foliage and ease of care.
